---
title: "Colocalization"
output: 
  html_notebook: 
    code_folding: hide
---

Apurva ran fastENLOC on eQTLs and each QTL top SNP from the Obesity 2020 paper.

```{r}
suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(tidyverse))

d <- read_csv("adiposity_eQTL_fastenloc_annotated.csv",
              col_types = "ciddcciccccccc")
```

```{r}
d |>
    ggplot(aes(x = regional_coloc_probab)) +
    geom_histogram(bins = 30)
```

```{r}
d |>
    arrange(desc(regional_coloc_probab)) |>
    filter(regional_coloc_probab > 0.01)
```
